content:
Error running a subcommand of /root/zulip/scripts/lib/create-production-venv: ln -s zulip-venv /root/zulip/zulip-current-venv
I got this error message when i did /root/zulip/scripts/setup/install
@Foo Chun Ong this is installing a production environment? Can you post /var/log/zulip/install.log ?
Hi Tim. I installed Ubuntu 14 instead Ubuntu 16 then solve the problem. Anyway appreciate your reply
